name: BlindTester
description:
BlindTester

Thomas RAULIN

You can now easily make Blind Test for you and your friends, you just need to import your own songs, do a screenshare and have fun fun.

BlindTester is a one week project beacause i was bored about all those crapy blind test video on youtube where I never guess a song , now you can do your own BlinTests

(no songs included)
